MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL30 postcode area of Llandudno. We had no advance warning of this and are working to get supplies restored. Our engineers have attended the local area and confirmed an fault on our electrical network near Pen Y Ffridd substation. Our emergency response teams and contrators will be back onsite this morning and will require access into the properties affected for further investigation checks.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:43am on 27th March
